title: 215 - Tim Gombis Absolutely Blew Our Minds About Why Jesus Had to Die
description:
Ok yâ€™all. THIS. Erre texted us with ALL CAPS about how this interview with Tim Gombis blew his mind. And he was SO RIGHT. ðŸ¤¯
.
They dive deep into the atonement and the reason Jesus had to die. Spoiler alert: Gombis asserts it wasnâ€™t for individual salvation but for the destruction of the present evil age and the cosmic enslavement we find ourselves in.
.
And it really was so much good stuff that we just hashed it out for an hour, even though it felt like 5 minutes. We are sorry this is two hours long....but itâ€™s worth it. Canâ€™t wait to hear your thoughts!
